"Battledia: Yellow":
"Battledias are training facilities that you can access by using Battle Triggers at special terminals called \"Trigger Portals\".

To access each training menu, you need to bring a specific type of trigger to its matching terminal. For example, you can access Yellow Terminals with \"B. Trigger/Aerio Yellow\"."

"The trigger you used will be consumed when the Quest is cleared.

The EXP you gain from enemies defeated during the Quest will be awarded all at once when you clear the Quest.

Certain Boost Effects will be disabled while in this Battledia."
